body:
This is just an idea

So since avicus is changing a lot, i think for the next tourney it could be a throwback tourny with a bunch or old avicus maps like Luar and Rendevous I,  that one with Good vs Bad, and many more i cant remember. This will give the players a good idea of what avicus was like back then, and stuff of the sort. Maybe it could be a 1.7 tournney, for fun. All i am saying is that it would be a Throwback tournament. anything else?

Just an idea

title: Tourney idea (next tourney)

replies.body:
Feel free to organize an unofficial tournament.
Dev_revs or one of the not so busy officials can help you with that.

replies.body: I actually have a plan of this after the official tournament, if you want to give suggestions feel tee to message me with them.
